060@RequiredArgsConstructor
061@Slf4j
062public class SQLQueryVisitor<S extends SearchParameter> implements QueryVisitor {
063
064  private static final String CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR = " AND ";
065  private static final String DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR = " OR ";
066  private static final String EQUALS_OPERATOR = " = ";
067  private static final String IN_OPERATOR = " IN";
068  private static final String GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR = " > ";
069  private static final String GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR = " >= ";
070  private static final String LESS_THAN_OPERATOR = " < ";
071  private static final String LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR = " <= ";
072  private static final String NOT_OPERATOR = "NOT ";
073  private static final String LIKE_OPERATOR = " LIKE ";
074  private static final String IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR = " IS NOT NULL";
075  private static final String IS_NULL_OPERATOR = " IS NULL";
076  private static final String IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR = "(%1$s IS NOT NULL AND size(%1$s) > 0)";
077  private static final String IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR = "(%1$s IS NULL OR size(%1$s) = 0)";
078  // where query to execute a select all
079  private static final String ALL_QUERY = "true";
080
081  private static final String SQL_ARRAY_PRE = "ARRAY";
082
083  private static final Function<Term, String> ARRAY_FN =
084      t -> "stringArrayContains(" + SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(t) + ",'%s',%b)";
085
086  private static final Function<Term, String> ARRAY_LIKE_FN =
087      t -> "stringArrayLike(" + SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(t) + ",'%s',%b)";
088
089  // TODO: handle derived taxon params for events
090  private static final Set<OccurrenceSearchParameter> TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS =
091      Set.of(
092          OccurrenceSearchParameter.KINGDOM_KEY,
093          OccurrenceSearchParameter.PHYLUM_KEY,
094          OccurrenceSearchParameter.CLASS_KEY,
095          OccurrenceSearchParameter.ORDER_KEY,
096          OccurrenceSearchParameter.FAMILY_KEY,
097          OccurrenceSearchParameter.SUBGENUS_KEY,
098          OccurrenceSearchParameter.GENUS_KEY,
099          OccurrenceSearchParameter.SPECIES_KEY,
100          OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY,
101          OccurrenceSearchParameter.ACCEPTED_TAXON_KEY);
102
103  private static final List<GadmTerm> GADM_GIDS =
104      List.of(GadmTerm.level0Gid, GadmTerm.level1Gid, GadmTerm.level2Gid, GadmTerm.level3Gid);
105
106  private StringBuilder builder;
107
108  private final SQLTermsMapper<S> sqlTermsMapper;
109
110  private final String defaultChecklistKey;
111
112  /** Transforms the value to the SQL statement lower(val). */
113  protected String toSQLLower(String val) {
114    return "lower(" + val + ")";
115  }
116
117  protected String toSQLField(S param, boolean matchCase) {
118    return Optional.ofNullable(term(param))
119        .map(
120            term -> {
121              String sqlCol = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term);
122              if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
123                  && (param != OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY)
124                  && !matchCase) {
125                return toSQLLower(sqlCol);
126              }
127              return sqlCol;
128            })
129        .orElseThrow(
130            () ->
131                // QueryBuildingException requires an underlying exception
132                new IllegalArgumentException(
133                    "Search parameter " + param.type().getName() + "." + param + " is not mapped"));
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Allow support for querying the denormalized extension.
138   *
139   * <p>FIXME - this can probably be factored out once all required fields are denormalized.
140   *
141   * @param param
142   * @param matchCase
143   * @return
144   */
145  protected String toSQLDenormField(S param, boolean matchCase) {
146    return Optional.ofNullable(term(param))
147        .map(
148            term -> {
149              if (term instanceof DwcTerm) {
150                DwcTerm dwcTerm = (DwcTerm) term;
151                String field = "Denorm.parents." + dwcTerm.simpleName();
152                if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
153                    && !"GEOMETRY".equals(param.name())
154                    && !matchCase) {
155                  return toSQLLower(field);
156                }
157                return field;
158              }
159              return null;
160            })
161        .orElseThrow(
162            () ->
163                // QueryBuildingException requires an underlying exception
164                new IllegalArgumentException(
165                    "Search parameter " + param + " is not mapped to Hive"));
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Converts a value to the form expected by Hive based on the SearchParameter. Most values pass by
170   * unaltered. Quotes are added for values that need to be quoted, escaping any existing quotes.
171   *
172   * @param param the type of parameter defining the expected type
173   * @param value the original query value
174   * @return the converted value expected by Hive
175   */
176  protected String toSQLValue(S param, String value, boolean matchCase) {
177    if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
178      // all enum parameters are uppercase
179      return '\'' + value.toUpperCase() + '\'';
180    }
181
182    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
183      // use longs for timestamps expressed as ISO dates
184      LocalDate ld = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDate(value);
185      Instant i = ld.atStartOfDay(ZoneOffset.UTC).toInstant();
186      if (isInterpretedUtcDateMilliseconds(term(param))) {
187        return String.valueOf(i.toEpochMilli());
188      } else {
189        return String.valueOf(i.getEpochSecond());
190      }
191
192    } else if (Number.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
193        || Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
194      // do not quote numbers
195      return value;
196
197    } else {
198      // quote value, escape existing quotes
199      String strVal = '\'' + value.replaceAll("'", "\\\\'") + '\'';
200      if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
201          && !"GEOMETRY".equals(param.name())
202          && !matchCase) {
203        return toSQLLower(strVal);
204      }
205      return strVal;
206    }
207  }
208
209  /**
210   * Translates a valid {@link org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Download} object and translates it into
211   * a strings that can be used as the <em>WHERE</em> clause for a SQL (hive or spark) download.
212   *
213   * @param predicate to translate
214   * @return WHERE clause
215   */
216  public String buildQuery(Predicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
217    String query = ALL_QUERY;
218    if (predicate != null) { // null predicate means a SELECT ALL
219      builder = new StringBuilder();
220      visit(predicate);
221      query = builder.toString();
222    }
223
224    // Set to null to prevent old StringBuilders hanging around in case this class is reused
225    // somewhere else
226    builder = null;
227    return query;
228  }
229
230  public void visit(ConjunctionPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
231
232    for (Predicate p : predicate.getPredicates()) {
233      if (p instanceof EqualsPredicate) {
234        EqualsPredicate eqPredicate = (EqualsPredicate) p;
235        if (eqPredicate.getKey() == EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE) {}
236      }
237    }
238
239    visitCompoundPredicate(predicate, CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
240  }
241
242  public void visit(DisjunctionPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
243    // See if this disjunction can be simplified into an IN predicate, which is much faster.
244    // We could overcomplicate this:
245    //   A=1 OR A=2 OR B=3 OR B=4 OR C>5 â†’ A IN(1,2) OR B IN (3,4) OR C>5
246    // but that's a very unusual query for us, so we just check for
247    // - EqualsPredicates everywhere
248    // - on the same search parameter.
249
250    boolean useIn = true;
251    Boolean matchCase = null;
252    List<String> values = new ArrayList<>();
253    S parameter = null;
254    String checklistsKey = null;
255
256    for (Predicate subPredicate : predicate.getPredicates()) {
257      if (subPredicate instanceof EqualsPredicate) {
258        EqualsPredicate<S> equalsSubPredicate = (EqualsPredicate<S>) subPredicate;
259        if (parameter == null) {
260          parameter = equalsSubPredicate.getKey();
261          matchCase = equalsSubPredicate.isMatchCase();
262          checklistsKey = getChecklistKey(equalsSubPredicate.getChecklistKey());
263        } else if (parameter != equalsSubPredicate.getKey()
264            || matchCase != equalsSubPredicate.isMatchCase()
265            || !Objects.equals(
266                checklistsKey, getChecklistKey(equalsSubPredicate.getChecklistKey()))) {
267          useIn = false;
268          break;
269        }
270        values.add(equalsSubPredicate.getValue());
271      } else {
272        useIn = false;
273        break;
274      }
275    }
276
277    if (useIn) {
278      visit(new InPredicate<>(parameter, values, matchCase));
279    } else {
280      visitCompoundPredicate(predicate, DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
281    }
282  }
283
284  public Function<Term, String> getArrayFn() {
285    return ARRAY_FN;
286  }
287
288  /** Supports all parameters incl taxonKey expansion for higher taxa. */
289  public void visit(EqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
290    if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getKey())) {
291      appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(predicate);
292    } else if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getKey())) {
293      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.classifications);
294    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_ISSUE) {
295      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifTerm.taxonomicIssue);
296    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_STATUS) {
297      appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.taxonomicStatuses);
298    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
299      appendGadmFilterList(GADM_GIDS, predicate.getValue());
300    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE) {
301      Optional.ofNullable(VocabularyUtils.lookupEnum(predicate.getValue(), MediaType.class))
302          .ifPresent(
303              mediaType ->
304                  builder.append(
305                      String.format(
306                          getArrayFn().apply(GbifTerm.mediaType), mediaType.name(), true)));
307    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE) {
308      builder.append(
309          String.format(
310              getArrayFn().apply(GbifTerm.issue), predicate.getValue().toUpperCase(), true));
311    } else if (sqlTermsMapper.isArray(predicate.getKey())) {
312      builder.append(
313          String.format(
314              getArrayFn().apply(sqlTermsMapper.getTermArray(predicate.getKey())),
315              predicate.getValue().replaceAll("'", "\\\\'"),
316              predicate.isMatchCase()));
317    } else if (sqlTermsMapper.isDenormedTerm(predicate.getKey())) {
318      builder
319          .append("(")
320          .append("(")
321          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
322          .append(EQUALS_OPERATOR)
323          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
324          .append(") OR (")
325          .append("stringArrayContains(")
326          .append(toSQLDenormField(predicate.getKey(), true))
327          .append(",")
328          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), true))
329          .append("))")
330          .append(")");
331    } else if (SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getKey()))) {
332      builder.append(
333          String.format(getArrayFn().apply(term(predicate.getKey())), predicate.getValue(), false));
334    } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
335      // Dates may contain a range even for an EqualsPredicate (e.g. "2000" or "2000-02")
336      // The user's query value is inclusive, but the parsed dateRange is exclusive of the
337      // upperBound to allow including the day itself.
338      //
339      // I.e. a predicate value 2000/2005-03 gives a dateRange [2000-01-01,2005-04-01)
340      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
341
342      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound() || dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
343        builder.append('(');
344        if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
345          visitSimplePredicate(
346              predicate,
347              GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
348              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
349          if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
350            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
351          }
352        }
353        if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
354          visitSimplePredicate(
355              predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
356        }
357        builder.append(')');
358      }
359    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
360      // Dates may contain a range even for an EqualsPredicate (e.g. "2000" or "2000-02")
361      // The user's query value is inclusive, but the parsed dateRange is exclusive of the
362      // upperBound to allow including the day itself.
363      //
364      // I.e. a predicate value 2000/2005-03 gives a dateRange [2000-01-01,2005-04-01)
365      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
366
367      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound() || dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
368        // all the stuff here
369        builder.append('(');
370        if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
371          SimplePredicate predicateGte =
372              new EqualsPredicate<>(
373                  InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE,
374                  predicate.getValue(),
375                  predicate.isMatchCase());
376          visitSimplePredicate(
377              predicateGte,
378              GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
379              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
380          if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
381            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
382          }
383        }
384        if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
385          SimplePredicate predicateLte =
386              new EqualsPredicate<>(
387                  InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE,
388                  predicate.getValue(),
389                  predicate.isMatchCase());
390          visitSimplePredicate(
391              predicateLte,
392              LESS_THAN_OPERATOR,
393              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
394        }
395        builder.append(')');
396      }
397    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME) {
398      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
399        Range<Double> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue());
400        if (range.hasLowerBound()) {
401          builder
402              .append("geologicaltime.gt")
403              .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
404              .append(range.lowerEndpoint());
405        }
406        if (range.hasUpperBound()) {
407          if (range.hasLowerBound()) {
408            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
409          }
410          builder
411              .append("geologicaltime.lte")
412              .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
413              .append(range.upperEndpoint());
414        }
415      } else {
416        builder
417            .append(predicate.getValue())
418            .append(GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR)
419            .append("geologicaltime.gt")
420            .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
421            .append(predicate.getValue())
422            .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
423            .append("geologicaltime.lte");
424      }
425    } else {
426      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, EQUALS_OPERATOR);
427    }
428  }
429
430  public void visit(GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
431    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
432      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
433      // "2000" includes all of 2000.
434      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
435      visitSimplePredicate(
436          predicate,
437          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
438          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
439    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
440      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
441      // "2000" includes all of 2000.
442      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
443      SimplePredicate predicateLte =
444          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
445              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE, predicate.getValue());
446      visitSimplePredicate(
447          predicateLte,
448          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
449          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
450    } else {
451      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
452    }
453  }
454
455  public void visit(GreaterThanPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
456    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
457      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
458      // range.
459      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the earliest date is 2001-01-01.
460      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
461      visitSimplePredicate(
462          predicate,
463          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
464          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
465    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
466      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
467      // range.
468      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the earliest date is 2001-01-01.
469      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
470      SimplePredicate predicateLte =
471          new GreaterThanPredicate<>(
472              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE, predicate.getValue());
473      visitSimplePredicate(
474          predicateLte,
475          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
476          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
477
478    } else {
479      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR);
480    }
481  }
482
483  public void visit(LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
484    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
485      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
486      // "2000" includes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2001-01-01 (not inclusive).
487      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
488      visitSimplePredicate(
489          predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
490    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
491      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
492      // "2000" includes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2001-01-01 (not inclusive).
493      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
494      SimplePredicate predicateGte =
495          new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
496              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE, predicate.getValue());
497      visitSimplePredicate(
498          predicateGte, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
499    } else {
500      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
501    }
502  }
503
504  public void visit(LessThanPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
505    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
506      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
507      // range.
508      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2000-01-01 (not inclusive).
509      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
510      visitSimplePredicate(
511          predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
512    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
513      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
514      // range.
515      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2000-01-01 (not inclusive).
516      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
517      SimplePredicate predicateGte =
518          new LessThanPredicate<>(
519              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE, predicate.getValue());
520      visitSimplePredicate(
521          predicateGte, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
522    } else {
523      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR);
524    }
525  }
526
527  public void visit(RangePredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
528    builder.append("((");
529
530    if (!Objects.isNull(predicate.getValue().getGte())) {
531      visitSimplePredicate(
532          new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getGte()),
533          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
534    } else {
535      visitSimplePredicate(
536          new LessThanPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getGt()),
537          GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR);
538    }
539
540    builder.append(")");
541    builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
542    builder.append("(");
543
544    if (!Objects.isNull(predicate.getValue().getLte())) {
545      visitSimplePredicate(
546          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getLte()),
547          LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
548    } else {
549      visitSimplePredicate(
550          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getLt()),
551          LESS_THAN_OPERATOR);
552    }
553    builder.append("))");
554  }
555
556  /*
557   * For large disjunctions, IN predicates are around 3Ã— faster than a perfectly balanced tree of
558   * OR predicates, and around 2Ã— faster than a fairly flat OR query.
559   *
560   * With Hive 1.3.0, balancing OR queries should be internal to Hive:
561   *   https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11398
562   * but it is probably still better to use an IN, which uses a hash table lookup internally:
563   *   https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11415#comment-14651085
564   */
565  public void visit(InPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
566
567    log.info("InPredicate " + predicate);
568
569    boolean isMatchCase = Optional.ofNullable(predicate.isMatchCase()).orElse(Boolean.FALSE);
570
571    if (isSQLArray(predicate.getKey()) || SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getKey()))) {
572      // Array values must be converted to ORs.
573      builder.append('(');
574      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
575      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
576        // Use the equals predicate to get the behaviour for array.
577        visit(new EqualsPredicate<S>(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
578        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
579          builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
580        }
581      }
582      builder.append(')');
583    } else if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getKey())) {
584      appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(predicate);
585    } else if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains((OccurrenceSearchParameter) predicate.getKey())) {
586      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.classifications);
587    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_ISSUE) {
588      appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(predicate, GbifTerm.taxonomicIssue);
589    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXONOMIC_STATUS) {
590      appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(predicate, GbifInternalTerm.taxonomicStatuses);
591    } else if (predicate.getKey().name().equals("GADM_GID")) {
592      // GADM GIDs must be expanded into a disjunction of in predicates
593      appendGadmGidFilter(predicate.getValues());
594    } else if (predicate.getKey().name().equals("EVENT_DATE")) {
595      // Event dates must be expanded into a disjunction of conjunction predicates (of comparisons)
596      builder.append('(');
597      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
598      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
599        // Use the equals predicate to get the behaviour for event dates.
600        visit(new EqualsPredicate<S>(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
601        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
602          builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
603        }
604      }
605      builder.append(')');
606
607    } else {
608      builder
609          .append('(')
610          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), isMatchCase))
611          .append(IN_OPERATOR)
612          .append('(');
613      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
614      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
615        builder.append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
616        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
617          builder.append(", ");
618        }
619      }
620      builder.append(")");
621
622      // this block can be removed in future if we don't need a denormalized
623      // AVRO extension
624      if (sqlTermsMapper.isDenormedTerm(predicate.getKey())) {
625        builder.append(" OR ").append('(');
626
627        Iterator<String> iterator2 = predicate.getValues().iterator();
628        while (iterator2.hasNext()) {
629          builder
630              .append('(')
631              // FIX ME
632              .append("array_contains(")
633              .append(toSQLDenormField(predicate.getKey(), true))
634              .append(',')
635              .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), iterator2.next(), true))
636              .append(')')
637              .append(')');
638          if (iterator2.hasNext()) {
639            builder.append(" OR ");
640          }
641        }
642        builder.append(")");
643      }
644      builder.append(")");
645    }
646  }
647
648  public void visit(LikePredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
649    if (sqlTermsMapper.isArray(predicate.getKey())) {
650      builder.append(
651          String.format(
652              ARRAY_LIKE_FN.apply(sqlTermsMapper.getTermArray(predicate.getKey())),
653              predicate.getValue().replaceAll("'", "\\\\'"),
654              predicate.isMatchCase()));
655    } else {
656      // Replace % â†’ \% and _ â†’ \_
657      // Then replace * â†’ % and ? â†’ _
658      LikePredicate<S> likePredicate =
659          new LikePredicate<>(
660              predicate.getKey(),
661              predicate
662                  .getValue()
663                  .replace("%", "\\%")
664                  .replace("_", "\\_")
665                  .replace('*', '%')
666                  .replace('?', '_'),
667              predicate.isMatchCase());
668
669      visitSimplePredicate(likePredicate, LIKE_OPERATOR);
670    }
671  }
672
673  public void visit(NotPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
674    builder.append(NOT_OPERATOR);
675    visit(predicate.getPredicate());
676  }
677
678  public void visit(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
679    if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getParameter())) {
680      appendHumboldtTaxonUnary(
681          getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()), IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR);
682    } else if (isSQLArray(predicate.getParameter())
683        || SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getParameter()))) {
684      builder.append(
685          String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true)));
686    } else if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getParameter())) {
687      appendTaxonKeyIsNotNull(predicate);
688    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
689      appendUnaryList(GADM_GIDS, IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
690    } else {
691      // matchCase: Avoid adding an unnecessary "lower()" when just testing for null.
692      builder.append(toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true));
693      builder.append(IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
694    }
695  }
696
697  public void visit(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
698    if (TAXON_SEARCH_PARAMETERS.contains(predicate.getParameter())) {
699      appendTaxonKeyNull(predicate);
700    } else if (isHumboldtTaxonParameter(predicate.getParameter())) {
701      appendHumboldtTaxonUnary(
702          getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()), IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR);
703    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
704      appendUnaryList(GADM_GIDS, IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
705    } else {
706      // matchCase: Avoid adding an unnecessary "lower()" when just testing for null.
707      if (isSQLArray(predicate.getParameter())) {
708        builder.append(
709            String.format(IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true)));
710      } else {
711        builder.append(toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true));
712        builder.append(IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
713      }
714    }
715  }
716
717  /** Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank. */
718  private void appendTaxonKeyIsNotNull(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate) {
719    builder.append('(');
720    builder.append(
721        String.format(
722            "classificationdetails['%s']['%s'] != ''",
723            getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()),
724            predicate.getParameter().name().replace("_", "").toLowerCase()));
725    builder.append(')');
726  }
727
728  /** Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank. */
729  private void appendTaxonKeyNull(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate) {
730    builder.append('(');
731    builder.append(
732        String.format(
733            "classificationdetails['%s']['%s'] = ''",
734            getChecklistKey(predicate.getChecklistKey()),
735            predicate.getParameter().name().replace("_", "").toLowerCase()));
736    builder.append(')');
737  }
738
739  public void visit(WithinPredicate within) throws QueryBuildingException {
740    JtsSpatialContextFactory spatialContextFactory = new JtsSpatialContextFactory();
741    spatialContextFactory.normWrapLongitude = true;
742    spatialContextFactory.srid = 4326;
743    spatialContextFactory.datelineRule = DatelineRule.ccwRect;
744
745    WKTReader reader =
746        new WKTReader(spatialContextFactory.newSpatialContext(), spatialContextFactory);
747
748    try {
749      // the geometry must be valid - it was validated in the predicates constructor
750      Shape geometry = reader.parse(within.getGeometry());
751
752      builder.append('(');
753      String withinGeometry;
754
755      // Add an additional filter to a bounding box around any shapes that aren't quadrilaterals, to
756      // speed up the query.
757      if (geometry instanceof JtsGeometry
758          && ((JtsGeometry) geometry).getGeom().getNumPoints() != 5) {
759        Geometry g = ((JtsGeometry) geometry).getGeom();
760        // Use the Spatial4J-fixed geometry; this is split into a multipolygon if it crosses the
761        // antimeridian.
762        withinGeometry = g.toText();
763
764        Rectangle bounds = geometry.getBoundingBox();
765        boundingBox(bounds);
766        builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
767
768        // A tool (R?) can generate hundreds of tiny areas spread across the globe, all in a single
769        // multipolygon.
770        // Add bounding boxes for these too.
771        // Example: https://www.gbif.org/occurrence/download/0187894-210914110416597
772        if (g instanceof MultiPolygon && g.getNumGeometries() > 2) {
773          builder.append("((");
774          for (int i = 0; i < g.getNumGeometries(); i++) {
775            if (i > 0) {
776              // Too many clauses exceeds Hive's query parsing stack.
777              if (i % 500 == 0) {
778                builder.append(')');
779                builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
780                builder.append('(');
781              } else {
782                builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
783              }
784            }
785            Geometry gi = g.getGeometryN(i);
786            Envelope env = gi.getEnvelopeInternal();
787            boundingBox(
788                new RectangleImpl(
789                    env.getMinX(),
790                    env.getMaxX(),
791                    env.getMinY(),
792                    env.getMaxY(),
793                    geometry.getContext()));
794          }
795          builder.append("))");
796          builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
797        }
798      } else {
799        withinGeometry = within.getGeometry();
800      }
801      builder
802          .append("contains('")
803          .append(withinGeometry)
804          .append("', ")
805          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
806          .append(", ")
807          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude));
808      // Without the "= TRUE", the expression may evaluate to TRUE or FALSE for all records,
809      // depending
810      // on the data format (ORC, Avro, Parquet, text) of the table (!).
811      // We could not reproduce the issue on our test cluster, so it seems safest to include this.
812      builder.append(") = TRUE").append(')');
813    } catch (Exception e) {
814      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
815    }
816  }
817
818  public void visit(GeoDistancePredicate geoDistance) throws QueryBuildingException {
819    builder
820        .append("(geoDistance(")
821        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getLatitude())
822        .append(", ")
823        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getLongitude())
824        .append(", '")
825        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getDistance().toString())
826        .append("', ")
827        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
828        .append(", ")
829        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
830        .append(") = TRUE)");
831  }
832
833  /**
834   * Given a bounding box, generates greater than / lesser than queries using decimalLatitude and
835   * decimalLongitude to form a bounding box.
836   */
837  private void boundingBox(Rectangle bounds) {
838    builder
839        .append('(')
840        // Latitude is easy:
841        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
842        .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
843        .append(bounds.getMinY())
844        .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
845        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
846        .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
847        .append(bounds.getMaxY())
848        .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
849
850        // Longitude must take account of crossing the antimeridian:
851        .append('(')
852        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
853        .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
854        .append(bounds.getMinX());
855    if (bounds.getMinX() < bounds.getMaxX()) {
856      builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
857    } else {
858      builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
859    }
860    builder
861        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
862        .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
863        .append(bounds.getMaxX())
864        .append(')')
865        .append(')');
866  }
867
868  /**
869   * Builds a list of predicates joined by 'op' statements. The final statement will look like this:
870   *
871   * <p>
872   *
873   * <pre>
874   * ((predicate) op (predicate) ... op (predicate))
875   * </pre>
876   */
877  public void visitCompoundPredicate(CompoundPredicate predicate, String op)
878      throws QueryBuildingException {
879    builder.append('(');
880    Iterator<Predicate> iterator = predicate.getPredicates().iterator();
881    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
882      Predicate subPredicate = iterator.next();
883      builder.append('(');
884      visit(subPredicate);
885      builder.append(')');
886      if (iterator.hasNext()) {
887        builder.append(op);
888      }
889    }
890    builder.append(')');
891  }
892
893  public void visitSimplePredicate(SimplePredicate<S> predicate, String op)
894      throws QueryBuildingException {
895    if (Number.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
896      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
897        if (Integer.class.equals(predicate.getKey().type())) {
898          visit(
899              toIntegerRangePredicate(
900                  SearchTypeValidator.parseIntegerRange(predicate.getValue()), predicate.getKey()));
901        } else {
902          visit(
903              toNumberRangePredicate(
904                  SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue()), predicate.getKey()));
905        }
906        return;
907      }
908    }
909
910    if (sqlTermsMapper.includeNullInPredicate(predicate)) {
911      String column = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLColumn(term(predicate.getKey()));
912      builder
913          .append('(')
914          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
915          .append(op)
916          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
917          .append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
918          .append(
919              isSQLArray(predicate.getKey())
920                  ? String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, column)
921                  : column + IS_NULL_OPERATOR)
922          .append(')');
923    } else {
924      builder
925          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
926          .append(op)
927          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()));
928    }
929  }
930
931  public void visitSimplePredicate(SimplePredicate<S> predicate, String op, String value)
932      throws QueryBuildingException {
933    if (sqlTermsMapper.includeNullInPredicate(predicate)) {
934      String column = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLColumn(term(predicate.getKey()));
935      builder
936          .append('(')
937          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
938          .append(op)
939          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), value, predicate.isMatchCase()))
940          .append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
941          .append(
942              isSQLArray(predicate.getKey())
943                  ? String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, column)
944                  : column + IS_NULL_OPERATOR)
945          .append(')');
946    } else {
947      builder
948          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
949          .append(op)
950          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), value, predicate.isMatchCase()));
951    }
952  }
953
954  /** Determines if the parameter type is a Hive array. */
955  protected boolean isSQLArray(S parameter) {
956    return SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLType(term(parameter)).startsWith(SQL_ARRAY_PRE);
957  }
958
959  /** Term associated to a search parameter */
960  public Term term(S parameter) {
961    return sqlTermsMapper.term(parameter);
962  }
963
964  private void appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(String checklistKey, S parameter, String value) {
965    Objects.requireNonNull(checklistKey);
966
967    String field = HUMBOLDT_TAXON_COLUMNS.getOrDefault(parameter, null);
968
969    if (field == null) {
970      return;
971    }
972
973    builder
974        .append('(')
975        .append(
976            String.format(
977                "stringArrayContains(%s['%s']['%s'], '%s', true)",
978                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(EcoTerm.targetTaxonomicScope),
979                getChecklistKey(checklistKey),
980                field,
981                value))
982        .append(')');
983  }
984
985  private void appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(EqualsPredicate<S> taxonPredicate) {
986    appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(
987        getChecklistKey(taxonPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
988        taxonPredicate.getKey(),
989        taxonPredicate.getValue());
990  }
991
992  private void appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(InPredicate<S> taxonPredicate) {
993    builder.append('(');
994    boolean first = true;
995    for (String value : taxonPredicate.getValues()) {
996      if (!first) {
997        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
998      }
999      appendHumboldtTaxonFilter(
1000          getChecklistKey(taxonPredicate.getChecklistKey()), taxonPredicate.getKey(), value);
1001      first = false;
1002    }
1003    builder.append(')');
1004  }
1005
1006  private void appendHumboldtTaxonUnary(String checklistKey, String unaryOperator) {
1007    Objects.requireNonNull(checklistKey);
1008    builder.append('(');
1009    builder.append(
1010        String.format(
1011            "%s['%s']['%s'] " + unaryOperator,
1012            SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(EcoTerm.targetTaxonomicScope),
1013            getChecklistKey(checklistKey),
1014            "usageName"));
1015    builder.append(')');
1016  }
1017
1018  /**
1019   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1020   *
1021   * @param taxonKeyPredicate to append as filter
1022   */
1023  private void appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(EqualsPredicate<S> taxonKeyPredicate, Term term) {
1024
1025    builder
1026        .append('(')
1027        .append(
1028            String.format(
1029                "stringArrayContains(%s['%s'], '%s', true)",
1030                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1031                getChecklistKey(taxonKeyPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1032                taxonKeyPredicate.getValue()))
1033        .append(')');
1034  }
1035
1036  /**
1037   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1038   *
1039   * @param taxonKeyPredicate to append as filter
1040   */
1041  private void appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(EqualsPredicate<S> taxonKeyPredicate, Term term) {
1042
1043    builder
1044        .append('(')
1045        .append(
1046            String.format(
1047                "%s['%s'] = '%s'",
1048                SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1049                getChecklistKey(taxonKeyPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1050                taxonKeyPredicate.getValue()))
1051        .append(')');
1052  }
1053
1054  /** Creates a disjunction of all the given terms. */
1055  private void appendGadmFilterList(List<? extends Term> terms, String value) {
1056    builder
1057        .append('(')
1058        .append(
1059            terms.stream()
1060                .map(
1061                    term ->
1062                        SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term)
1063                            + EQUALS_OPERATOR
1064                            + "'"
1065                            + value
1066                            + "'")
1067                .collect(Collectors.joining(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)))
1068        .append(')');
1069  }
1070
1071  /**
1072   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank, for multiple keys.
1073   *
1074   * @param taxonomicPredicate to append as filter
1075   */
1076  private void appendTaxonomicArrayFilter(InPredicate<S> taxonomicPredicate, Term term) {
1077
1078    Collection<String> taxonKeys = taxonomicPredicate.getValues();
1079
1080    builder.append('(');
1081    boolean first = true;
1082    for (String taxonKey : taxonKeys) {
1083      if (!first) {
1084        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
1085      }
1086      builder
1087          .append('(')
1088          .append(
1089              String.format(
1090                  "stringArrayContains(%s['%s'], '%s', true)",
1091                  SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1092                  getChecklistKey(taxonomicPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1093                  taxonKey))
1094          .append(')');
1095      first = false;
1096    }
1097    builder.append(')');
1098  }
1099
1100  /**
1101   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank, for multiple keys.
1102   *
1103   * @param taxonomicPredicate to append as filter
1104   */
1105  private void appendTaxonomicSingleValueFilter(InPredicate<S> taxonomicPredicate, Term term) {
1106
1107    Collection<String> taxonKeys = taxonomicPredicate.getValues();
1108
1109    builder.append('(');
1110    boolean first = true;
1111    for (String taxonKey : taxonKeys) {
1112      if (!first) {
1113        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
1114      }
1115      builder
1116          .append('(')
1117          .append(
1118              String.format(
1119                  "%s['%s'] = '%s'",
1120                  SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term),
1121                  getChecklistKey(taxonomicPredicate.getChecklistKey()),
1122                  taxonKey))
1123          .append(')');
1124      first = false;
1125    }
1126    builder.append(')');
1127  }
1128
1129  /**
1130   * Searches every level of GADM GID in Hive for multiple keys.
1131   *
1132   * @param gadmGids to append as filter
1133   */
1134  private void appendGadmGidFilter(Collection<String> gadmGids) {
1135    builder.append('(');
1136    boolean first = true;
1137    for (Term term : GADM_GIDS) {
1138      if (!first) {
1139        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
1140      }
1141      builder.append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term)).append(IN_OPERATOR).append('(');
1142      Iterator<String> iterator = gadmGids.iterator();
1143      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
1144        // Hardcoded GADM_LEVEL_0_GID since the type of all these parameters is the same.
1145        // Using .toUpperCase() is safe, GIDs must be ASCII anyway.
1146        builder.append(
1147            toSQLValue(sqlTermsMapper.getDefaultGadmLevel(), iterator.next().toUpperCase(), true));
1148        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
1149          builder.append(", ");
1150        }
1151      }
1152      builder.append(")");
1153      first = false;
1154    }
1155    builder.append(')');
1156  }
1157
1158  /**
1159   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1160   *
1161   * @param unaryOperator to append as filter
1162   */
1163  private void appendUnaryList(List<? extends Term> terms, String unaryOperator) {
1164    builder.append('(');
1165    builder.append(
1166        terms.stream()
1167            .map(term -> SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term) + unaryOperator)
1168            .collect(Collectors.joining(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)));
1169    builder.append(')');
1170  }
1171
1172  /**
1173   * Converts decimal range into a predicate with the form: field >= range.lower AND field <=
1174   * range.upper.
1175   */
1176  private Predicate toNumberRangePredicate(Range<Double> range, S key) {
1177    if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
1178      return new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1179          key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()));
1180    }
1181    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
1182      return new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1183          key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue()));
1184    }
1185
1186    List<Predicate> predicates =
1187        List.of(
1188            new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1189                key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue())),
1190            new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1191                key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue())));
1192    return new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1193  }
1194
1195  /**
1196   * Converts integer range into a predicate with the form: field >= range.lower AND field <=
1197   * range.upper.
1198   */
1199  private Predicate toIntegerRangePredicate(Range<Integer> range, S key) {
1200    if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
1201      return new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1202          key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().intValue()));
1203    }
1204    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
1205      return new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1206          key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()));
1207    }
1208
1209    List<Predicate> predicates =
1210        List.of(
1211            new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1212                key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().intValue())),
1213            new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1214                key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().intValue())));
1215    return new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1216  }
1217
1218  private void visit(Object object) throws QueryBuildingException {
1219    Method method = null;
1220    try {
1221      method = getClass().getMethod("visit", new Class[] {object.getClass()});
1222    } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
1223      log.warn(
1224          "Visit method could not be found. That means a unknown Predicate has been passed", e);
1225      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Predicate", e);
1226    }
1227    try {
1228      method.invoke(this, object);
1229    } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
1230      log.error(
1231          "This error shouldn't occur if all visit methods are public. Probably a programming error",
1232          e);
1233      throw new RuntimeException(e);
1234    } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
1235      log.info("Exception thrown while building the query", e);
1236      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
1237    }
1238  }
1239
1240  private boolean isHumboldtTaxonParameter(S parameter) {
1241    return HUMBOLDT_TAXON_COLUMNS.containsKey(parameter);
1242  }
1243
1244  private String getChecklistKey(String checklistKey) {
1245    return !isNullOrEmpty(checklistKey) ? checklistKey : defaultChecklistKey;
1246  }
1247
1248  public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(@Nullable String string) {
1249    return string == null || string.isEmpty();
1250  }
1251}
